title: ICE: non_lifetime_binders: resolve_bound_vars.rs: called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust #![feature(non_lifetime_binders)] #![allow(incomplete_features)] #![crate_type = "lib"] pub fn f() where for (T, U): Copy {} ``` ### Meta Latest master (f722b24eb9ea35a7cc187a1cb5c50d4d324f5855): ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', compiler/rustc_hir_analysis/src/collect/resolve_bound_vars.rs:1012:75 ```
Backtrace

``` stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f6f3cf08a87 - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::trace_unsynchronized::h8317dca8f1569d65 1: 0x7f6f3ceb83f7 - ::fmt::hf47fa547ae6f40de 2: 0x7f6f3cf5d4c7 - core::fmt::write::h485466f956dc1ae8 3: 0x7f6f3cec4471 -
